permafrost.tundra.io

Class DirectoryLister

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.io.DirectoryLister

  • public class DirectoryLister
extends java.lang.Object
    Directory lister which supports file name filtering.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DirectoryLister(java.io.File directory, boolean recurse)
      Constructs a new DirectoryLister for listing the contents of a given directory.
      DirectoryLister(java.io.File directory, boolean recurse, java.io.FilenameFilter... filters)
      Constructs a new DirectoryLister for listing the contents of a given directory.
      DirectoryLister(java.lang.String directory, boolean recurse)
      Constructs a new DirectoryLister for listing the contents of a given directory.
      DirectoryLister(java.lang.String directory, boolean recurse, java.io.FilenameFilter... filters)
      Constructs a new DirectoryLister for listing the contents of a given directory.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.io.File getDirectory()
      Returns the directory that will be listed.
      boolean getRecurse()
      Returns whether the listing will be recursive.
      DirectoryListing list()
      Lists the directory.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DirectoryLister

        public DirectoryLister(java.lang.String directory,
                       boolean recurse)
        Constructs a new DirectoryLister for listing the contents of a given directory.
        Parameters:
        directory - The directory whose contents are to be listed.
        recurse - If true, all child directories will be recursively listed also.

      • DirectoryLister

        public DirectoryLister(java.io.File directory,
                       boolean recurse)
        Constructs a new DirectoryLister for listing the contents of a given directory.
        Parameters:
        directory - The directory whose contents are to be listed.
        recurse - If true, all child directories will be recursively listed also.

      • DirectoryLister

        public DirectoryLister(java.lang.String directory,
                       boolean recurse,
                       java.io.FilenameFilter... filters)
        Constructs a new DirectoryLister for listing the contents of a given directory.
        Parameters:
        directory - The directory whose contents are to be listed.
        recurse - If true, all child directories will be recursively listed also.
        filters - One or more filename filters which will restrict which files and directories are returned in the list results.

      • DirectoryLister

        public DirectoryLister(java.io.File directory,
                       boolean recurse,
                       java.io.FilenameFilter... filters)
        Constructs a new DirectoryLister for listing the contents of a given directory.
        Parameters:
        directory - The directory whose contents are to be listed.
        recurse - If true, all child directories will be recursively listed also.
        filters - One or more filename filters which will restrict which files and directories are returned in the list results.

    • Method Detail

        public java.io.File getDirectory()
        Returns the directory that will be listed.
        Returns:
        The directory that will be listed.

      • getRecurse

        public boolean getRecurse()
        Returns whether the listing will be recursive.
        Returns:
        If true, child directories will be recursively listed also.

      • list

        public DirectoryListing list()
                      throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Lists the directory.
        Returns:
        A list of files and directories that match the specified filters.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - If the directory does not exist.
